If you like getting matched against people with 500-1500 hours in the game every match whilst you're new, and getting totally stompted then this game is most likely for you. If you're not a masochist, then look for something else.
玩了99个小时 感觉游戏体验还行

好玩，没得说，就是好玩啊，玩了几十个小时逃生者，最后发现最适合当杀手，把把3杀4杀真的过瘾，当然了偶尔也有被大神遛的时候，但这才是游戏嘛，有挑战性，有势均力敌的对手才有乐趣。新手的话希望多体验，不要玩了一两把被虐成狗就选择放弃这款良心好游戏，要学会学习其他人的玩法，找到最适合的方式，苟还是遛，人皇还是机皇，满图追杀还是套路偷袭，守尸还是阻止维修发电机，恐怖元素，血型元素，动作元素，策略元素这款游戏都有，值得玩，真的强烈推荐入坑。。
Love it, hope a sequel comes with better graphics and gameplay tweaks

4 survivor 1 katil temalı oyun.5 jeneratör yapıp kapıları açıp kaçmanız gerekiyor.Yada hatch dediğimiz kapağı bularak kaçabilirsiniz.Oyunun pay to win olmaması güzel.Oyun içinde kazandığınız bloodpoints ile karakterinizi geliştirebilir ve perkler açabilirsiniz.Oyunda bug var ama ciddi deredece rahatsız etmiyor.Hitboxlarda sorun var.Ciddiye alınmadan oynanırsa keyif verebilir.Arkadaş ortamında daha çok eğlenceli hale geliyor.Yeni başlarsanız oyunun size verdiği karakterlerden kendinize uygun olanı bulun ve onu geliştirip oynayın.Zamanla diğer karakterleri geliştirin.Demir irade-sayılı gün-kum torbası perklerini survivor olarak kullanmanızı öneririm.

Ben böyle oyunun eşleştirme sisteminin ayrı ceza sisteminin ayrı(ki zaten yok kafanıza göre afk kalabilirsiniz.) a********. Oyun güzel ama eşleştirme sistemi kadar leş bir sistem görmedim. Rank 18'im 40 saatim var Rank 1 1500 saati olan oyuncu(oyuncu dedim pardon allah diyecektim) gelmiş beni yeniyor üstüne teabag yapıyor. Ceza sistemine gelecek olursak kafanıza göre afk kalabilirsiniz küfürler edebilirsiniz hiçbir ceza almıyorsunuz. :D Kısacası kanser olmak isteyen bu oyunu alabilir, teşekkürler^^
At this point we will literally die by daylight
Gutes und Spannendes Spiel mit Freunden

Many people like to talk shit about this game, most of them play this gam every day....

Dead by Daylight is one of the games you will always keep coming back to, simply because it is unique and one of a kind
Yes, the devs often screw things up with their updates, ignore bugs for too long and release killers that nobody asked for, but ultimately Dead by Daylight is one of the most fun games to play, be it on twitch, youtube, with friends or just on your own.

You will often get mad at the game, the players and sometimes yourself, but Dead by Daylight is still one of the most fun games you will find

oyun o kadar iyi ki 3mb güncelleme indiriyor 35 dakikada anca kuruyor.

Один из лучших онлайн хорроров на данный момент, но это делает игру гораздо хуже чем она могла бы быть. Из за отсутствия конкуренции разработчики не пытаются ее доделать либо настроить сервера. Игра очень классная из за атмосферы и геймплея который долго не надоедает (на основе наиграл около 2к часов), но отсутствие баланса, когда на некоторые картах палетки на каждом углу а на некоторых картах мансить почти не реально, такие маны как нюрса может летать через стены по всей карте, а легион в обилке не может сделать нечего и таких примеров много. Также маньяки которые хитуют за киллометр из за проблем с серверами и тд, отсутствие баланса среди адоннов и перков. Тупейшая ранговая система, один режим которые уже года 3 как всем надоел. Но не смотря на все это игра далеко не плоха и заслуживает своей популярности, единственное что хочется от игры это баланса, разнообразия и нормальных серверов.

The game is fun, but that depends on what you consider fun. The majority of those still playing online is like those who only play Orochi or Centurion in For Honor, so what you should expect is people who know only use cheap tactics and exploitations to win. And that goes both for killers and survivors.

On top of that, like I said before, the perks and items are horribly unbalanced and nearly broken. Certain ones are for sure fair and all that, but most of them are just evil to watch in action. 

The worst item imo is the flashlight, not only does it blind the killer (Not mad about that.) But if the killer has someone in their hands at the time, the survivor is dropped and is able to basically get a second wind and run away. Understand it's frustrating when you spent 45 minutes looking for any survivor, knock them twice (Which takes two years to recover from your swing, hit or miss) pick them up to take them to a hook, and drop them because you get blinded and they get to run away free. Now imagine a lone killer going up against an entire team of flashlighters, on 10 different occasions.

But the perks for killers are just as bad, there's one that increases your speed depending on what rank it is right? Sounds fair, but depending on what rank it quite literally makes Michael Myers look like he's speed walking with a sprinter's speed to murder you. And it doesn't even matter if you pick a different character, you can unlock every perk available for that killer and or survivor, so literally there is no reason to play any other character as you'll eventually have everything for just one.

There is only one gamemode and that is the traditional, cat and mice gamemode. Unlike L4D2, (A game that makes a Cameo in this one.) which featured a "Mutations" selection that took the normal gamemode and added a twist, this one only has one. It's boring and it makes it harder to come back, even without all the other BS. 

One thing I feel has spoiled me is my love of how Overwatch patched, fixed, tweaked, and fine tuned the game as much as possible. Ironically I hate Overwatch's censorship but that's for another review. Point is that DBD, doesn't get ANY kind of patching, fixes, tweaks, and or fine tuning. It quite literally is the same game from launch, minus they add new characters, perks, and maps.

Which brings me to the Dev team, the worst part of this game. The dev team itself is a group of morons whose only job is to pat themselves on the back and take credit for the game being made. On top of that, and negative criticsim is either tuned out or berated because "They simply don't understand." The devs are a bunch of whiney twats and think because they made a broken mess into a game and get the rights for popular horror characters to play as they should get applause everywhere they go. They made a cash cow unintentionally and haven't done anything since they realized it was one.


Pros:
New characters, maps, and perks
Fun to play with friends
Suspenseful at times 
Freeplay allows you to test each combination of perks at the highest ranks

Cons:
Lazy and greedy devs
No fixes or balancing of any kind
Only one gamemode
Toxic playerbase
Online
Connectivity issues (You could have the best ping and it still wouldn't be enough.)
Aging graphics and design
All online matches are ranked
Freeplay is invite only

I personally regret purchasing this game. I do not recommend it and would advise on not buying it, if you get it for free then good for you. Keep it or refund it if that's the case.
A pretty adictive game that is fun to play with your friends!
